attributes.action: Raise the minimum age to drive a motor vehicle to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Raising the minimum age from 17 to 18 would surely cut the amount of cars using the roads,this may have a significant effect on congestion without the need for road charging etc,not to mention a reduction in accidents caused by young drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
